title: Report Environmental Exceedance
description: A water quality sensor at a site's discharge point shows a pH level outside the permitted range. The site environmental officer must report it.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the sensor alarm for the pH exceedance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the specific sensor and the measured value.

tasks.description: Retrieve the site's environmental permit to confirm the allowable pH range.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the measured pH is outside the permitted limits.

tasks.description: Log the exceedance in the environmental management system and notify the state regulatory agency as required by the permit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a formal incident report and sends the required notification to the agency.
